word:
Chapter 25 

     17-22. Living Angels Beside Heavenly Ark.--The ark of the earthly sanctuary was the pattern of the true ark in heaven. There, beside the heavenly ark, stand living angels, each with one wing overshadowing the mercy-seat, and stretching forth on high, while the other wings are folded over their forms in token of reverence and humility (ST March 21, 1911).
